Posts.Content: tamspitler wrote: I've only done 4 treatments and getting ready to start my 12 weekly treatments next week for triple negative breast cancer. Just noticed my double chin is worse than before diagnosis. Everything I found online was people who had radiation and/or some type of head neck or throat cancer. Anyone else have this experience? I've always been self conscious of my double chin and receding jawline and now it's worse. Going through enough with all the treatment. Just want to cry! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Double chin from chemo tamspitler tamspitler

Posts.Content: Jan 9, 2017 01:36PM tamspitler wrote: Thanks for the positive thoughts. I can't wait till the end of treatment to get back into a normal routine of diet and exercise. Before treatment I needed to do that but of course that's on hold and I'm happy to be maintaining.
